name: Scarecrow Samurai - top down hack 'n slash game for Android
blurb: Fight an army of Japanese demons and samurai raccoons in this top-down hack 'n slash game (in Android and browser version).

rewards.reward: All of our backers will get free of charge acces to the premium content of Android freemium version, regardless of your pledge amount!
ONE RACCOON - Thank you for your pledge! Team Kobayaghi loves you :) We will thank all of our backers on our web site. All of our backers will be notified by e-mail when game is online, free to play.
RACCOON MOB - Rewards from $1 + you'll receive Scarecrow Samurai Desktop Wallpaper of your choice in four most common screen resolutions.
RACCOON PATROL - Rewards from $1 + we will thank you with whole Set of Scarecrow Samurai Desktop Wallpapers and Digital DRM-free SOUNDTRACK from the game!

RACCOON SQUADRON - Download of Scarecrow Samurai Digital Art Book in PDF with concepts, illustrations, character designs and weapon gallery with descriptions, historical facts and stories from Japanese mythology! Plus rewards from $10.

RACCOON BATTALION - \r\nRewards from $20 + you will receive a letter from Scarecrow Samurai's clan honoring you personally for defending the crops. Letter will be stamped with seal of Kakashi clan handwritten on old paper in both English and Japanese.

RACCOON REGIMENT - Rewards from $30 + your name will be carved in a stone wall of Warlord Kobayaghi's castle that appears in the game! Also you will receive another letter from Kobayaghi\u2019s clan inviting you to flip over to his side, with a secret code you can use to access clan\u2019s site hidden from public eyes.
RACCOON BRIGADE - All rewards from $50 + Warlord Kobayaghi will be threatening you - mentioning your name - in an angry and revengeful speech he will deliver at the end of the game!

RACCOON DIVISION - All rewards from $100 +  we will make additional  enemy character designed to look like an animal or creature that you like (character must fit with overall story and game world, no fishes and flying creatures please!). You can help us design the character and name it.

RACCOON CORPS - All rewards from $100 +  custom made additional sidekick character that can look like your pet or some other animal that you like (character must fit with overall story and game world). You can help us design the character and name it. This character will be selectable at the start of the game, with Bunny Ronin being a default choice.

RACCOON ARMY - All rewards from $250 + we will make you large unique Japanese hanging scroll (max.size 60x20 inches (1.5x0.5 metters)) with painting that depicts any scene from the game that you want - for example, a fight between Bunny Ronin and Gashadokuro Demon Boss, as seen from the ground level. Digitaly made painting will be printed with quality colors (UltraChrome K3 pigment, in 2880 x 1440 dpi) on linen fabric. We will hand-made the whole scroll from wood, paper, fabric and rope and send it to you anywhere in the world so you can proudly hang it on your wall. You can choose color, dimensions, ornaments, content and style of painting (it can be made in traditional sumi-e style, cartoony, or in more realistic style)
